headline: Constellation Brands to Report Second Quarter 2026 Financial Results on October 1, 2025 After Market Close and Host Conference Call on October 2, 2025 at 10:30 am ET
summary: ROCHESTER, N.Y., Aug. 28, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Constellation Brands, Inc. (NYSE: STZ), a leading beverage alcohol company, announced today it will report financial results for its second quarter ending August 31, 2025, on Wednesday, October 1, 2025, after the close of the U.S. markets by posting the earnings release and financial tables, as well as other supporting materials, on the company’s investor relations website at ir.cbrands.com.
